name: Estate Inc.
description:
A game to become a Billionaire owning a real-estate empire with well known properties in major cities around the world.

Buy more Properties to increase your Value and Rent income
Collect Rent as you your source of incomeHint: simply touch the Dollar icon in the Property overview list when it appears
Upgrade properties to collect higher Rent and increase the Property Value

Speed up your growth and income
Use TimeBoost to collect Rent instantly, instead of waiting until Rent is due
Open Office to buy Properties in that city
Complete Office with owning all Properties in that city to get 20% more Rent

Collect your income more efficient and faster
Hire Office Team which is required for using CityCollect Accelerators starting Level 10
Use CityCollect with Office Teams to collect all available Rent at once
Share your success and post to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, WhatApp, WeChat, etc.

From the start you have 3 properties and offices in different cities.
